mapper.select: /* kr.ac.usu.student.mapper.StudentRegisterMapper.selectRegisterRequestList */ WITH COMVIEW AS ( SELECT COM_CODE , COM_CODE_GRP , COM_CODE_NM , COM_CODE_DESC , USE_YN , COM_CODE_SEQ , UPPER_CODE_GRP , UPPER_COM_CODE FROM COM_CODE WHERE COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC013' ), SKNRGVIEW AS ( SELECT COM_CODE , COM_CODE_GRP , COM_CODE_NM , COM_CODE_DESC , USE_YN , COM_CODE_SEQ , UPPER_CODE_GRP , UPPER_COM_CODE FROM COM_CODE WHERE COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC024' ) SELECT SKNRG_NO , SV.COM_CODE_NM SKNRG_SE , STDNT_NO , SKNRG_DATE , C.COM_CODE_NM CONFM_SE , SKNRG_RETURN , SR.SUBJCT_NO , S.SUBJCT_NM , TARGET_SEM FROM SCHOOL_REGISTER SR INNER JOIN COMVIEW C ON (SR.CONFM_SE = C.COM_CODE) INNER JOIN SKNRGVIEW SV ON (SR.SKNRG_SE = SV.COM_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SUBJECT S ON (S.SUBJCT_NO = SR.SUBJCT_NO) WHERE STDNT_NO = #{stdntNo}
